nolspotlex.v1
Class Trap

java.lang.Object
  nolspotlex.v1.Trap

public class Trap
extends java.lang.Object

The Trap class allows the creation of a trap - The trap door will slows the game if the user tries to go through it.

Version:
2011.10.24
Author:
Alexandre Boursier and Nolan Potier

Constructor Summary
Trap()
          Create a random trap The goal of this method is to choose amongst rooms a trap which consist in falling into a new room we can cross one way.

Constructor Detail

Trap

public Trap()
Create a random trap The goal of this method is to choose amongst rooms a trap which consist in falling into a new room we can cross one way. The following way brings the player to the bedroom.
